page.title: 13Tremorfa Landscape
page.content: {Tremorfa.}Tremorfa is mainly a residential area.The council housing estate in Tremorfa was built in 1936.There are three bus routes which pass through Tremorfa plus another 11 services using the busy Newport Road.The main British Rail line passes through the area carrying trains from Cardiff Central Station to places like Bristol,London,Hereford,Portsmouth,Man chester and Scotland.Other rail lines run throught the area carrying freight to and from the docks area. Clubs in the area include;St. Albans Rugby Club,Pengam Moors Social Club ,St. Phillips Pensioners' Club and St. Phillips Scouts and Guides. EGASSEM05600186
